text: Shooting guard is a position in basketball. Here is a list of all of the best shooting Guards in the NBA, past and present. (By order of worst to best) https://syndication.bleacherreport.com/amp/2222903-br-nba-legends-100-ranking- the-greatest-shooting-guards-of-all-time.amp.html Gail Goodrich, Eddie Jones, Alvin Robertson, Jeff Hornacek, Joe Dumars, Bill Sharman, Manu Ginobili, Vince Carter, Tracy McGrady, Sidney Moncrief, Reggie Miller, Ray Allen, George Gervin, Allen Iverson, Clyde Drexler, Dwyane Wade, Kobe Bryant, Stephen Curry, Michael Jordan. Category:Basketball positions
title: Shooting guard
